title: Beacon's Call 3
author: Adventurer H. C.
pages: But there's a twist in our tale. We've a dangerous journey ahead to gather the beacon's heartâ€”The Wither Star.
In a land of soul sand, I must tread. The Wither Skulls are a rare find, a true mark of my most harrowing battles.
With blazing steel, I vanquish the nefarious blazes, wielders of fire, for their rods are key in my brewing preparations.
Yet the real challenge lies with the Wither Skeletons. Each clash a gamble, but perseverance will yield the dark heads.
